1182410.name: Purgatory Guardian
1182410.description:
INTRODUCTION

Welcome to your afterlife.
Become a Purgatory Guardian, a lone protector of souls wandering the realm between life and death. Once destined to ascend to Heaven, this Purgatory has been corrupted by ancient sins, forgotten gods, and demonic hunger. Only one warrior remains capable of restoring balance: you.

The Purgatory Guardian is a semi-open-world action RPG first-person shooter set in an alternate vision of Purgatory inspired by Dante’s Inferno. Souls from every era collide here, each carrying their sins and the secrets they left behind.

As a guardian, you will explore ruined cities, cursed deserts, shattered temples, and forbidden archives. Meet historical figures trapped in the afterlife with unfinished legacies. Discover lost lore, mythical creatures, and hidden truths buried for centuries.

GREATER CHALLENGES BRING GREATER REWARDS

Face forgotten gods, demonic rulers, twisted angels, and monstrous creatures thriving on the suffering of lost souls. Upgrade your gear, unlock powerful “Gifts,” and shape your playstyle through strength, agility, arcane power, and advanced weapon abilities.

Master devastating attacks, brutal finishers, and supernatural powers to carve your path through the corruption. Leave demons bleeding in the ash so all may witness how far you have risen.

RISE TOGETHER

Features:

  • Immersive, lore-rich story set in a reimagined Purgatory

  • Defend the Last City of Souls as it faces extinction

  • Evolve into the ultimate guardian through deep character progression

  • Follow multiple paths and beliefs, uncovering how different cultures shaped the afterlife

  • Explore dangerous regions filled with secrets, artifacts, and powerful enemies

  • Replay special missions to farm rare resources and strengthen your arsenal

  • Collect unique weapons and armor to customize your combat style

  • Discover a detailed codex with real historical and mythological references

DEMO

The free demo includes one full campaign stage and one additional side quest.

Guardian tasks will have you return to corrupted locations to maintain peace and stability in those regions.

Mature Content Description

This game contains mature themes not suitable for all audiences, including frequent violence and gore, dark religious themes, nudity, and other adult content.
